rComments: This class is really interesting, but it would definitely be easier if you have prior dance experience. Besides the dance, the assignments are pretty straightforward. She lets you use all your notes for the test, as well as her notes, and the required performance is a fun experience. Try to make it to hers if you can, its beautiful.
needs to make her lectures more interesting and requiring students to see 2 performances seems a bit unfair, however to get rid of 2 ges its a good class

The material would be very interesting if she found a way to relate it to anything practical, but she doesn't. She's also way too concerned about promoting her own dance company. The material seems pretty random, and in the end, you're no better of a dancer. You just know a silly little routine. She can also be rude at times.

Very interesting course, but she can be a little hard to understand sometimes. Open note midterm, dance performance for the final. You need to attend lecture as well as the dance instruction (included in class time). There are two papers, one 500 words on anything concerning classical indian dance and the other 1000 words on a dance performance
